name: HEREMENEGILDO Ludum Dare 43
description:
Arrow Keys/D-Pad - Move character

Enter Key/Action Button - Action

Esc Key/Cancel - Go back in options

HERMENEGILDO is a top down 2D dungeon crawler created for the Ludum Dare 43 game jam. The theme of the jam is “Sacrifices must be made.” The game works in the opposite of traditional games where upgrades occur as the game progresses. In HERMENEGILDO, the player starts out fully upgraded and must sacrifice one upgrade at each step of game progression.

Team

John Gale - Programmer, Narrative

Michael Morrell - Audio

John Hellrung - Level Designer

Tools

RPG Maker MV - main game engine and art assets
